section.p:
If there is a tick in the box, immediately.
If not, put a tick there now, and read on.
The noble removes his mask. To your surprise, you see that he has blue skin. He is a purebred, or high caste noble, part of the ancient royal clan of Uttaku, called Lord Elbistan.
As the bout progresses, it becomes clear that your opponent is no match for you. You should be able to beat him easily.
